00025 #ifndef SDBX_RTREE_VISITOR_H
00026 #define SDBX_RTREE_VISITOR_H
00027 
00028 
00029 #ifdef USE_MSVC_MEMORY_TRACING
00030         // this enables advanced memory leak detection
00031         #include <wx/msw/msvcrt.h>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 
00035 /********************************************************************
00036  * These are all 'acceptor' functors used for queries, and they have 
00037  * the following characteristics:
00038  *
00039  * template<typename Item>
00040  *
00041  *      bool operator()(const Item &item, bool isLeaf)
00042  *              -- returns true if this branch (or if isLeaf is true, the leaf)
00043  *                 should be visited
00044  *
00045  * This class of functions should be easy to copy, and are expected 
00046  * to be const. They are only used to determine whether something i
00047  * 
00048  ********************************************************************/
00049 
00051 template <typename NodeItem, typename LeafItem>
00052 struct RTreeAcceptOverlapping
00053 {
00054         const typename NodeItem::KeyType &m_bound;
00055         explicit RTreeAcceptOverlapping(const typename NodeItem::KeyType &bound) : m_bound(bound) {
00056                 assert(bound.verify());
00057         }
00058         
00059         bool operator()(const NodeItem &item) const 
00060         { 
00061                 return m_bound.overlaps(item.key);
00062         }
00063         
00064         bool operator()(const LeafItem &item) const 
00065         { 
00066                 return m_bound.overlaps(item.key);
00067         }
00068         
00069         private: RTreeAcceptOverlapping(){}
00070 };
00071 
00072 
00074 template <typename NodeItem, typename LeafItem>
00075 struct RTreeAcceptEnclosing
00076 {
00077         const typename NodeItem::KeyType &m_bound;
00078         explicit RTreeAcceptEnclosing(const typename NodeItem::KeyType &bound) : m_bound(bound) 
00079         {
00080                 assert(bound.verify());
00081         }
00082         
00083         bool operator()(const NodeItem &item) const 
00084         { 
00085                 return m_bound.overlaps(item.key);
00086         }
00087         
00088         bool operator()(const LeafItem &item) const 
00089         { 
00090                 return m_bound.encloses(item.key);
00091         }
00092         
00093         private: RTreeAcceptEnclosing(){}
00094 };
00095 
00096 
00099 template <typename NodeItem, typename LeafItem>
00100 struct RTreeAcceptAny
00101 {
00102         bool operator()(const NodeItem &item) const  { return true; }
00103         bool operator()(const LeafItem &item) const  { return true;     }
00104 };
